name: DfE Sign-in
description: DfE Sign-in is the department's identity and access management solution for secure user access to digital services.

needs.need: Service teams who need to provide an authentication process to access DfE services.

name: Cloud Infrastructure Platform (CIP)
description: CIP is a set of principles, processes and technologies that support the development and delivery of cloud computing, applications and services.

needs.need: Service teams who need to host their services securely.

name: GOV.UK PaaS
description: GOV.UK Platform as a Service (PaaS) is a platform developed by Government Digital Service (GDS) and available for government departments to deploy applications and backend services.

needs.need: Service teams who need to host their services securely.

services.name: Move to a 4 day school week
